name: Anomalarity: A Distributive Allegory
storyline:
You play the “man in the chair” in this haunting cosmic thriller “Anomalarity”; a short story set in the uncanny WAVEFORM universe. As a desperate survivor amidst the cosmic horror apocalypse, you stumble upon the enigmatic “Facility” and become entangled in a generational plot, guided by a mysterious benefactor.

Utilizing a growing toolbox of technologies and robotic drones, explore the hostile environment of the Facility, uncover secrets, and retrieve vital lost data. With each data delivery, the fabric of reality shifts, granting you newfound abilities and introducing intriguing companions who will help you unravel the Facilities shadowy history. In Anomalarity, every decision matters. Blindly following instructions from the mysterious benefactor may lead to unintended consequences, making it crucial to think critically and adapt your approach.
summary: Anomalarity is a narrative-driven escape room with an analogue thriller aesthetic. Explore an abandoned underground complex, solve puzzles, and gather allies to secure your escape.
